short_summary: **Heavy construction services at High Commission of Canada to Kenya, in Nairobi**
description: **Repair and construction work on a portion of the wall at the High Commission of Canada to Kenya, in Nairobi. Interested respondents may submit their qualifications and respond to questions. Outline of expected qualification criteria including qualifications, experience, and demonstrated ability required for the job. Respondents must submit a Response to all the requirements mentioned in the ITQ for the work. Final submitted responses must contain minimum requirements mentioned.**
duration_in_months: With no end date set (-subject to approval-
full_summary:
================================

### Invitation to Qualify: Construction of Wall Perimeter at the High Commission of Canada to Kenya

#### Solicitation Overview

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) of the Canadian Government is issuing an Invitation to Qualify for the repair work and construction of a section of perimeter wall at the High Commission of Canada to Kenya, in Nairobi. This Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) defines the requirements for the qualification of Respondents for this project.

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** 24-247620
* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-13
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-27T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None

#### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** Public Works (CNST)
* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify
* **Proposal Submission Period:** Until the tender closing date

#### Required Experience and Qualifications

Respondents must have experience in the delivery of construction services, specifically in perimeter wall construction projects. 

#### Selection Criteria

The selection of qualified Respondents will be based on their experience, qualifications, and proposed approach to deliver the project.

#### Contact Information

For more information about this tender, please contact:

* Name: Lydia Zervos
* Email: [realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca](mailto:realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 572-7269

#### Attachment and Additional Information

Please refer to the attachments for the Invitation to Qualify document, Question and Answers document, ITQ Addendum 1 and 2, in both English and French.
